para.text: This chapter shall apply as of October 1, 2015.
Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to affect any public-private partnerships, projects, or agreements that are developed, solicited, awarded, or entered into before this chapter applies.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of D.C. Law 20-228, § 302(a), see § 7008 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).

The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 21-36, in (a), redesignated (a)(1) as (a), deleted (a)(2) and (a)(3), and substituted “as of October 1, 2015” for “upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan.”
